body.p: You'll find everything you need to cook the recipes in this book in our kitchen. I've divided where to find things based on what they are

section.title: Dry ingredients
section.p: Dry ingredients such as rolled oats, flour, sugar, and baking soda, can all be found in the top cupboard across from the sink, nearest to the basement door.

section.title: Fresh ingredients
section.p: Fresh ingredients such as meats, vegetables, as well as refrigerated items such as milk, butter, and tofu, can all be found in the refrigerator. If an ingredient has either a "C", "A", or no marking on it, it's free to use. If there is a "J" or a "T" marking on it, you can't use it.

section.title: Seasonings
section.p: All seasonings such as cumin and cinnamon can be found on the shelf above the oven.

li.p: The coffee machine is next to the microwave.
The toaster is on the counter that lines the far wall behind the stove.
All pots and pants are in the cabinets below and to the left of the sink.
More frequently used cooking utensils are in the vase next to the stove, but there are more in the drawer to the left of the stove.
